cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2

Class OAuth2

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2.OAuth2

  • public class OAuth2
extends java.lang.Object
    cz.zcu.kiv.multicloud.oauth2/OAuth2.java

    Implementation of the OAuth 2.0 authorization framework. This implementation is specifically designed for the use with cloud storage services, but it also might be suitable for other uses.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jaromír Staněk

    • Method Detail

      • authorize

        public OAuth2Error authorize(java.lang.String storeKey)
                      throws OAuth2SettingsException,
                             java.lang.InterruptedException
        Handles the whole process of requesting for authorization and stores the received access token in the credential store. This call is blocking in case the authorization flow requires data flow from authorization server to this client.
        Parameters:
        storeKey - Key used for storing the access token.
        Returns:
        Error that occurred during the process.
        Throws:
        OAuth2SettingsException - Exception when not proper settings are passed.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Exception when authorization process is interrupted.

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes all the resources used by the grant.

      • getAuthCallback

        public AuthorizationCallback getAuthCallback()
        Returns the authorization callback.
        Returns:
        Authorization callback.

      • getObtainedStoreKey

        public java.lang.String getObtainedStoreKey()
        Returns the last identifier returned from the credential store after storing an access token.
        Returns:
        Identifier.

      • getSettings

        public OAuth2Settings getSettings()
        Returns the settings of the authorization.
        Returns:
        The settings.

      • getStore

        public CredentialStore getStore()
        Returns the credential store used.
        Returns:
        Credential store.

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion()
        Returns the version of the OAuth implementation.
        Returns:
        OAuth implementation version.

      • refresh

        public OAuth2Error refresh(java.lang.String storeKey)
                    throws OAuth2SettingsException
        This method represents the authorization flow for obtaining new access token supplying refresh token to the token server.
        Parameters:
        storeKey - Key used for storing the access token.
        Returns:
        Error that occurred during the process.
        Throws:
        OAuth2SettingsException - Exception when not proper settings are passed.
